availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Dennis Brewer (Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer, justice of the peace, and soldier)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer, justice of the peace, and soldier. North Carolina native. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Breathitt County in 1864. Corporal in the Three Forks Infantry Battalion from January 1865 to July 1865.

ab.bibl: Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 782; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 51; Find A Grave, "Dennis Brewer (1823-1910)," Memorial #153625090, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=153625090&ref=acom (accessed March 23, 2017); KYR-0001-007-0308.
